comment: And today...no more vaccine symptoms. All is well. I read a book under the rose bush to pretend I was still allowed to take the day easy, but now I'm going to have to stop faking it and do some dishes.
amr:
# ::snt And today...no more vaccine symptoms. All is well. I read a book under the rose bush to pretend I was still allowed to take the day easy, but now I'm going to have to stop faking it and do some dishes.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op2 (s / symptom
                  :polarity -
                  :mod (v / vaccine)
                  :quant (m2 / more)
                  :time (t / today)))
      :snt2 (w / well-09
            :ARG1 (a2 / all))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (r / read-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (b / book
                        :location (u / under
                              :op1 (r2 / rosebush)))
                  :purpose (p / pretend-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (a3 / allow-01
                              :ARG1 (t2 / take-01
                                    :ARG0 ii
                                    :ARG1 (d / day)
                                    :ARG1-of (e / easy-05))
                              :mod (s2 / still))))
            :ARG2 (o / obligate-01
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :ARG2 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (s3 / stop-01
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :ARG1 (f / fake-01
                                    :ARG0 ii
                                    :ARG1 b))
                        :op2 (d2 / do-02
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :ARG1 (d3 / dish
                                    :quant (s4 / some))))
                  :time (n / now))))

comment: Vaccine the second, update. Am I tired because I'm tired, or because vaccine? Could go either way.
amr:
# ::snt Vaccine the second, update. Am I tired because I'm tired, or because vaccine? Could go either way.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (u / update-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (v / vaccine)
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                  :value 2))
      :snt2 (t / truth-value
            :polarity-of (t2 / tire-01
                  :ARG1 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (t3 / tire-01
                              :ARG1 ii))))
      :snt3 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (g / go-01
                  :ARG1 (v2 / vaccine)
                  :ARG2 (w / way
                        :mod (e / either)))))
